body: Is the Democratic Republic of Congo prepared for elections this year?: "We have yet to see the new electoral commission (CENI) inaugurated, as legislators are still bickering about its composition. The revision of the electoral roll is ongoing in the provinces, but there have been many complaints about the lack of registration sites where people can register."
original_body: Is the Democratic Republic of Congo prepared for elections this year?: "We have yet to see the new electoral commission (CENI) inaugurated, as legislators are still bickering about its composition. The revision of the electoral roll is ongoing in the provinces, but there have been many complaints about the lack of registration sites where people can register."
title: D.R. of Congo: Are we prepared for elections?

sentence: Is the Democratic Republic of Congo prepared for elections this year?: "We have yet to see the new electoral commission (CENI) inaugurated, as legislators are still bickering about its composition.
The revision of the electoral roll is ongoing in the provinces, but there have been many complaints about the lack of registration sites where people can register."
